results.content:
In a word, Excellent! 

Jeppe urges you to think forward so that while you're chipping away at the included course content, you will see how the standards apply to larger applications later on. Following the course segment by segment gave me certainty since I saw quick outcomes (which spurred me onwards). Presently, I have begun to assemble applications that reflect genuine sites and usefulness since I have an idea of how what I was learning applies to more complex applications later on. 

I highly recommended it.

response.content: Thank you so much, Sipo ? I'm really happy to hear that you like my course so much. I would love to see your web applications once finished. ?
